content: this classic cozy and ribbed cap is punctuated with a round of cables and knit with one hank of woolstok tweed experience level * advanced beginner materials * woolstok tweed aran 85% highland wool 15% donegal 100g/109yds 1 hank * size 10 6mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge * size 10 6mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge * stitch marker * tapestry needle * cable needle finished measurements * circumference 19 relaxed * height 9 color shown * prairie sky no 3304
